metadata.Title: CVE-2022-27943 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.Description: libiberty/rust-demangle.c in GNU GCC 11.2 allows stack consumption indemangle_const, as demonstrated by nm-new.

criterions.comment: gcc-7: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
